findings.title: Public functions not declared as external
findings.description: A public function that could be declared external to save gas.
findings.location: TimeToken contract, Functions: ERC20.name(), ERC20.symbol(), ERC20.decimals, ERC20.totalSupply, ERC20.balanceOf, ERC20.allowance, ERC20.approve, ERC20.transferFrom, LinkERC20.increaseApproval, LinkERC20.decreaseApproval, ERC677Token.transferAndCall, ERC677Receiver.onTokenTransfer
